title: DeductionType
description: This is used to define generic voluntary deductions. e.g. vacation club, charity donations, etc.

statusCode.description: The action to be performed, Default is Create. Create - Add a new entry, Update is to add the current values to any existing values.

deductionCycleCode.description: The frequency the deduction should be taken. E.g monthly, weekly, etc.  The information would only be provided where it differs from the person's payroll frequency.  For example, a quarterly union deduction for a weekly based person.

sequence.description: The order of this deduction within all of the deductions.

typeDeduction.description: The type of deduction. E.g. benefit, court order, garnishment, etc.

subTypeCode.description: The category within the deduction type.  E.g. for garnishments this could be creditor, child support, etc.  For benefits, this could be medical, car, voluntary insurance.

referenceId.description: The third party reference for the deduction. i.e. court order number, union membership number, etc.

requestedAmount.description: The amount to be deducted, if available.

actualAmount.description: The amount actually deducted after processing payroll.

originalBalanceAmount.description: The total amount to be withheld over the life of this deduction.

remainingBalanceAmount.description: The current amount of the deduction after processing payroll.

requestedPercentage.description: The percent to be withheld.  For example, an elected 3% retirement deduction.

basis.description: TODO: describe or define an array of basis.

personName.NOTE: Should garnishmentment payment be in the description?
personName.description: The name of the person receiving the garnishment payment.

personCommunication.NOTE: Should garnishmentment payment be in the description?
personCommunication.description: The phone, address, and/or email of the person receiving the garnishment payment.

organizationName.description: The name of the organization receiving payment.
